\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXArrowSLName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_ArrowSL}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXProdName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Prod}}

}{

}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXArrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Arrow}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXArrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \lesssim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \lesssim  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \lesssim  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXForallName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Forall}}

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \lesssim  \ottsym{(}   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXForallName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_succ}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXsuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXncaseName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_ncase}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXncase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{    \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{C}   \quad   \mathsf{nat}( \ottnt{C} ) =   \mathsf{Nat}      \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A}  }%
\ottpremise{    \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Nat}   \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXncaseName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXemptyName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_empty}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottsym{[]}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \top  ).   \mathsf{List}\, \ottmv{X}   }{%
{\ottdruleTXXemptyName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXconsName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_cons}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \mathsf{list}( \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ) =   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{3}}}}      \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXconsName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} ) .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_Lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma , \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A}   \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t}   :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B}  }{%
{\ottdruleTXXLamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtypeAppName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_typeApp}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtypeApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B} ).  \ottnt{C}    \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \lesssim  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }   [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXtypeAppName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXSubName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_Sub}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXSub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \lesssim  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXSubName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlcaseName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_lcase}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXlcase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{C}   \quad   \mathsf{list}( \ottnt{C} ) =   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   }%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B}     \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXlcaseName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXappName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_app}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{C}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \mathsf{fun}( \ottnt{C} ) =  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXappName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \mathsf{prod}( \ottnt{B} ) =   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{T\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \mathsf{prod}( \ottnt{B} ) =   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{SG} }  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleTXXsndName}{}%
}}

{\ottdruleciXXzeroName}{}%
}}

 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{triv}   \Rightarrow   \mathsf{triv}   :   \mathsf{Unit}  }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsuccUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_succU}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsuccU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{unbox}_{  \mathsf{Nat}  }  \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXsuccUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_succ}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXsuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXncaseUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_ncaseU}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXncaseU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A}     \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} , \ottnt{A} ) =  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{A} ) =  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \quad     \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Nat}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     }%
\ottpremise{   \ottnt{t''}  \ottsym{=}  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{unbox}_{  \mathsf{Nat}  }  \, \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{)}  \quad  \ottnt{t''_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}    \quad  \ottnt{t''_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t''} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t''_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t''_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXncaseUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXncaseName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_ncase}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXncase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'}  :   \mathsf{Nat}    \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A}  }%
\ottpremise{     \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Nat}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A}   }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t'} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXncaseName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXfstUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_fstU}}

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottsym{(}   \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \times  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \ottsym{)} }  \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXfstUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_fst}}

 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%

}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_snd}}

}{

\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXconsUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_consU}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXconsU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}   \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{box}_{ \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  ::  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \ottsym{)} }  \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}   \ottsym{)}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXconsUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXconsName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_cons}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}      \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \lesssim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ) =  \ottnt{c}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}   \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  ::  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXconsName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlcaseUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_lcaseU}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlcaseU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{    \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{B} ) =  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}     \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} , \ottnt{B} ) =  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B}     \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \ottsym{)} }  \, \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{)} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}   \ottsym{)}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXlcaseUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlcaseName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_lcase}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlcase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{    \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}    \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{B} ) =  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}     \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} , \ottnt{B} ) =  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B}     \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t'} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}   \ottsym{)}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXlcaseName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \Rightarrow   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_appU}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} , \ottsym{\mbox{?}} ) =  \ottnt{c}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{unbox}_{ \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{)} }  \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXappUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_app}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
\ottpremise{    \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}     \quad   \mathsf{caster}( \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} , \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) =  \ottnt{c}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{c} \, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXappName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXLamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_Lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B}  }{%
